[Page Title: Rudy Royale]

0 
Rudy Royale Chicken + Cocktails

Located in downtown Charleston, Rudy Royale combines a fun atmosphere with approachable yet elevated seasonal cuisine
Book Your Reservation CHICKEN + COCKTAILS + LIVE-FIRE GRILL + FUN 
Private events for every occasion!
Contact Us to Book Your Event

[Page Title: Book your next special event! — Rudy Royale]

0 
Private Dining + Events

Three Special Event Spaces

Armory Room

Located in the back of the restaurant, the Armory Room boasts a quiet space away from the hustle and bustle of the main restaurant. With exposed brick, wood beams, and original armory room door, the space offers a unique Charleston charm with rustic touches.

48 guests, table service | 60 guests, reception style | AV Capable

Limmerick

Nestled in the center of the restaurant, guests will find our quaint private dining space. The Limmerick Room offers a more intimate setting, ideal for business meetings, family dinners, baby showers, bachelor and bachelorette parties. Includes a screen for slideshows and presentations. Sliding doors provide privacy from restaurant diners or can be open into the larger event space, Custom House.

15 guests, table service | AV Capable

Custom House

Custom House sits at the front of the restaurant with direct views of Charleston’s custom house. A bright and cheery space with room for a larger party. An ideal location for wedding rehearsal dinners, wedding receptions, or corporate events. Can be combined with Limmerick Room.

70 guests, table service | 100 guests, reception style

BOOK YOUR EVENT!
